mapper.insert: insert into Board (title, userid, contents) values (#{title},#{userid},#{contents});
mapper.select: select bno, title, userid, regdate, thumbs, views from Board order by bno desc;
mapper.update: update Board set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, regdate = current_timestamp where bno = #{bno};
